newsitem.title: HONG KONG: Chairman still in talks to sell Welback.
newsitem.headline: Chairman still in talks to sell Welback.

text.p: Welback Holdings Ltd's chairman Lee Chun Kwok and managing director Fong Wing Seng are still in talks to sell their stake in the company, the video game maker said in a statement on Monday.
"It is still at the negotiation stage and such sale and purchase may or may not materialize," the statement said.
In March, Welback said Lee and Fong had been approached by an independent third party in relation to a possible acquisition of their stake in the company.
Lee and Fong hold an aggregate 140.84 million shares or 59.05 percent of Welback, the company said.
Shares in Welback rose HK$0.10 or 15.63 percent to HK$0.74 a share in late trade on Monday on volume of 20.93 million shares.
